pullrequest.title: [Blueprint] Add support for moving and rotating models

content.raw:
I recompiled `common`, `rendering` and `gazebo` with gcc and the error went away. Before I was using a mix of gcc and clang and the mesh manager singleton was different when creating the gizmo mesh and when retrieving it:

~~~
[GUI] [Dbg] [BaseGizmoVisual.hh:531]  MeshManager: 0x7fa568c55a10
[GUI] [Dbg] [MeshDescriptor.cc:53] MeshManager: 0x7fa57050f178
~~~

One of the error messages above was misleading. I made [a PR to ign-rendering](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/170/more-error-messages/diff) with some extra error messages.
content.html:
I recompiled common, rendering and gazebo with gcc and the error went away. Before I was using a mix of gcc and clang and the mesh manager singleton was different when creating the gizmo mesh and when retrieving it:

[GUI] [Dbg] [BaseGizmoVisual.hh:531]  MeshManager: 0x7fa568c55a10
[GUI] [Dbg] [MeshDescriptor.cc:53] MeshManager: 0x7fa57050f178

One of the error messages above was misleading. I made a PR to ign-rendering with some extra error messages.
